short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Popup dictionary for hawaiian words. Highlight a word, then press shift to search. Use the arrow keys to navigate definitions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This popup dictionary allows the user to look up the definition of Hawaiian words.

Simply highlight the text to look up and press shift!

Controls:
SHIFT - open/close dictionary.
Arrow keys - navigate definition pages.
